briefdescription.para: Can be implemented to initialize the plugin to a certain state.

detaileddescription.para: This function gets called when the plugin is first instantiated.

parameterdescription.para: Globally unique dataset identifier (use only for deserialization)

briefdescription.para: Removes a cluster by its unique identifier.

parameterdescription.para: Unique identifier of the cluster to remove

briefdescription.para: Remove clusters by their unique identifiers.

parameterdescription.para: Unique identifiers of the clusters to remove
Name of the cluster to search for

simplesect.para: Index of the cluster (-1 if not found)
Variant representation of the widget action
